Package Classes

Class EventListsManager

java.lang.Object
Classes.EventListsManager
public class EventListsManager extends Object
EventListsManager The EventListsManager class manages event lists by interacting with Firebase Firestore. Supports adding, updating, and removing entries in various event-related lists.
See Also:
  • EventLists

    • addUserToWaitingList

      public void addUserToWaitingList(String eventID, String userID, EventListsManager.OnEventListsUpdateListener listener, Double latitude, Double longitude)
      Adds a user to the waiting list for an event.
      Parameters:
      eventID - the ID of the event
      userID - the ID of the user to add
      listener - a listener to handle success or error
      latitude - the latitude for the user's location (optional)
      longitude - the longitude for the user's location (optional)
